description: Designed and implemented scalable, cloud-based data pipelines for processing and analyzing healthcare datasets in real-time, utilizing AWS services (Glue, Redshift, S3).
Developed ETL processes for integrating structured and unstructured healthcare data from multiple sources, ensuring seamless data flow while maintaining compliance with HIPAA regulations.
Optimized data processing workflows, reducing pipeline runtimes by 35% and improving data retrieval time for clinical applications.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including clinicians and healthcare analysts, to create data models supporting predictive analytics for patient care and operational efficiency.
Established and maintained cloud-based data governance practices to ensure data security, quality, and compliance with healthcare standards.
Assisted in the design and development of ETL pipelines using Databricks and Spark for processing large healthcare datasets.
Integrated healthcare data from various sources, including patient records and clinical data, while adhering to industry standards for privacy and security.
Conducted data cleansing and transformation activities to ensure the accuracy and integrity of data for reporting and analysis.
Supported the development of data models and visualizations to aid in decision-making across healthcare teams.
Gained exposure to cloud technologies and healthcare data regulations, ensuring compliance with HIPAA and other healthcare standards.
Led the architecture and design of large-scale data pipelines, processing terabytes of healthcare and marketing data, ensuring fast, reliable, and secure data processing.
Spearheaded initiatives to integrate cloud technologies such as AWS and Snowflake for data storage and analytics, reducing processing times by 40%.
Designed and implemented data models and optimized database schemas for reporting and business intelligence, driving insights into customer behavior and healthcare trends.
Established data governance frameworks, ensuring HIPAA compliance and enhancing the overall data quality and accessibility across teams.
Led a team of data engineers, providing mentorship and ensuring the timely delivery of data engineering solutions in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
Engineered data pipelines using Spark and Scala to process large-scale marketing and healthcare datasets, ensuring high performance and scalability.
Implemented ETL processes for seamless data integration from various marketing and healthcare platforms into a centralized data warehouse.
Collaborated with data scientists and analysts to enable advanced analytics and machine learning models for customer and healthcare insights.
Managed cloud infrastructure on AWS for data storage, processing, and analytics, enhancing system efficiency and scalability.

projects.name: Cloud-Based Healthcare Data Pipeline
description: Developed a cloud-based ETL pipeline on AWS to process and integrate clinical data from Electronic Health Records (EHR) systems for predictive analytics and patient care improvement.

projects.name: Real-Time Health Data Monitoring System
description: Engineered a real-time data processing pipeline for streaming health data from wearables, ensuring seamless integration and analytics for patient health monitoring.

resume_data.Professional_Summary: Detail-oriented Data Engineer with a strong background in healthcare data management, cloud technologies, and big data engineering. Expertise in building scalable data pipelines, implementing ETL/ELT processes, and integrating cloud platforms such as AWS and Snowflake. Experienced in analyzing large datasets to extract actionable insights and improve decision-making processes within the healthcare sector. Proven track record of collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality, compliant, and efficient data solutions. Skilled in troubleshooting complex data issues and maintaining data governance standards.
